Accept.definition: to receive with consent [ a gift] [ service] b

1 a.definition: to receive with consent [ a gift] [ service]

sub_terms.b: to assent to the receipt of and treat in such a way as to indicate ownership of [the shipment despite discovering defects in the merchandise] compare

1 a.note: Under section 2-606(1) of the Uniform Commercial Code, a buyer accepts goods if: 1) he or she indicates to the seller after a reasonable opportunity to inspect them that he or she will keep them; 2) he or she fails to effectively reject them; 3) he or she acts in a way that is inconsistent with seller's ownership of the goods.
1 a.ed: the shipment despite discovering defects in the merchandise] compare

2.definition: to receive and assume ownership of goods [under section 2-606(1), buyer hasif he has done any of the acts described therein "J. J. White and R. S. Summers"]
2.ed: if he has done any of the acts described therein "J. J. White and R. S. Summers"]

3.definition: to assume orally, in writing, or by conduct an obligation to pay [a draft]

4.definition: to receive (a report) officially (as from a committee)

1.definition: to receive favorably something offered usually used with[no person…shall… of any present "art. I"]
